attributes.title: Volume 5 Yang Character Short
attributes.caption: You know that Ruby is unstoppable with her scythe, but Yang knows the true power of hand-to-hand combat. In the midst of a weapon-free training session, can Yang convince her sister of the importance of fighting without a weapon? Watch to see what happens
attributes.description: You know that Ruby is unstoppable with her scythe, but Yang knows the true power of hand-to-hand combat. In the midst of a weapon-free training session, can Yang convince her sister of the importance of fighting without a weapon? Watch to see what happens, and tune in TODAY with your FIRST membership to see Chapter 1 of RWBY Volume 5!

attributes.title: Volume 5 Weiss Character Short - Premieres Oct 14
attributes.caption: All her life, Weiss Schnee has lived a privileged and pampered life... but it did not come without its own hardships.
attributes.description: All her life, Weiss Schnee has lived a privileged and pampered life... but it did not come without its own hardships. RWBY Volume 5 Premieres October 14 on Rooster Teeth FIRST.

attributes.title: Volume 4 Character Short
attributes.caption: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.
attributes.description: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.

attributes.title: Volume 3: Opening Animation
attributes.caption: RWBY returns to take on the challenges of the Vytal Festival Tournament, and the evil that lurks beyond! RWBY Volume 3 premieres at RoosterTeeth.com October 24th, 2015!   This sneak peek at the opening title sequence animation for RWBY Volume 3 features n
attributes.description:
RWBY returns to take on the challenges of the Vytal Festival Tournament, and the evil that lurks beyond! RWBY Volume 3 premieres at RoosterTeeth.com October 24th, 2015! 

This sneak peek at the opening title sequence animation for RWBY Volume 3 features new track When It Falls, by Jeff Williams featuring Casey Lee Williams!

attributes.description: Return to the world of RWBY as the cast and crew share how the show is made! In this second diary, we follow the concept art and modeling phases, and take a peek at how Velvet's new look has evolved.

attributes.caption: RWBY
attributes.description:

The single of the opening title song "Time To Say Goodbye" by Jeff Williams featuring Casey Lee Williams is available at iTunes and other digital music services: http://bit.ly/1i7Zd6P

attributes.title: Volume 5 Blake Character Short - Premieres Oct 14
attributes.caption: Though Blake Belladonna eventually made the choice to leave the White Fang and its growing acts of terror, not all of her friends made the same decision.
attributes.description: RWBY Volume 5 Premieres October 14 on Rooster Teeth FIRST. Start your free trial http://bit.ly/2uudqse ||| The White Fang was once a peaceful organization fighting for true equality for the Faunus. Over the years, however, many members began to favor violent and extreme tactics in order to demand respect from the humans of Remnant. Though Blake Belladonna eventually decided to leave the White Fang and its growing acts of terror, not all of her friends made the same decision.
attributes.display_title: Volume 5 Blake Character Short - Premieres Oct 14

attributes.title: Volume 5: Intro
attributes.caption: The huntresses of team RWBY continue to search for answers on their individual journeys toward Haven Academy. Will the four finally reunite? What fate awaits the broken world of Remnant? Join FIRST to watch the episodes early!
attributes.description: The huntresses of team RWBY continue to search for answers on their individual journeys toward Haven Academy. Will the four finally reunite? What fate awaits the broken world of Remnant? Join FIRST to watch the episodes early!

attributes.title: Volume 5 Trailer
attributes.caption: Unite now with your fellow Huntsmen and Huntresses because RWBY is back! Tune in October 14th for the Volume 5 premiere as Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang journey toward Haven Academy. Not a FIRST member? Start your 30-day free trial now to catch it first!
attributes.description: Grab your fellow Huntsmen and Huntresses and mark your calendars, because RWBY is back October 14th! Be sure to sign up for your free FIRST 30-day trial to gain access to Volume 5 the second it’s released. Follow Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang as they battle their way through their own unique journeys on their way to Haven Academy. What new adventures will they encounter next? Tune in October 14th with your FIRST membership to find out!

attributes.title: Cosplay Highlights
attributes.caption: RWBY
attributes.description: Watch the RWBY Cosplayers talk about the show, their involvement with RWBY, and the characters they enact. RWBY is a new animated series from Rooster Teeth, directed by Monty Oum. The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

attributes.title: Volume 6 Adam Character Short
attributes.caption: Willing to strike down anyone who gets in the way of his twisted version of justice, Adam has declared to fight for the rights of his people, but over the years he's strayed further and further from these idealistic claims.
attributes.description:
Willing to strike down anyone who gets in the way of his twisted version of justice, Adam has declared to fight for the rights of his people, but over the years he's strayed further and further from these idealistic claims.

He's a dangerous combination of ferocity and delusion who's only goal is to torment his ex-partner, Blake Belladonna, whom he considers to be responsible for his fall from power.

RWBY Volume 6 premieres October 27 on Rooster Teeth!

Sign up for your free trial of FIRST to see the episodes the day it drops and catch all your favorite shows early.

attributes.title: RWBY Volume 6: Only On RoosterTeeth.com
attributes.caption: Read more at https://roosterteeth.com/post/51894268
attributes.description:
Read more at https://roosterteeth.com/post/51894268
Sign up for Rooster Teeth FIRST: https://first-signup.roosterteeth.com/

RWBY Volume 6, premiering on October 27, will live only on RoosterTeeth.com and the Rooster Teeth mobile apps. It will be available for FIRST Members for one week, and then totally free to watch thereafter.

We're committed to making the viewing experience as good on Rooster Teeth as anywhere else. And along with RWBY’s release this fall, we’ll also be unveiling some much requested features on Rooster Teeth including:

-  Closed-captioning support for RWBY Volume 6, and captions for other major new animation releases coming soon after
-  Chromecast support
-  Tap to rewind and fast-forward
And last but not least...
- In-App video downloading for paying members

We are so excited to bring you all home, and to kick off our 6th volume of RWBY in a huge way. We couldn't do this without your support, so please join us (on RoosterTeeth.com and the apps) this fall for the premiere!

attributes.title: RWBY Volume 6 Trailer
attributes.caption: Team RWBY is reunited, and their first mission back is one of grave importance: escorting the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas.
attributes.description: Team RWBY is reunited, and their first mission back is one of grave importance: escorting the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas. With the world seemingly crumbling around them and Grimm lurking around every corner, traversing Remnant to reach their destination will be more dangerous than anyone could have imagined.

attributes.caption: Team RWBY is reunited, and their first mission back is one of grave importance: escorting the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas.

attributes.title: Volume 7 Trailer
attributes.caption: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang have fought hard alongside their friends to bring the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas, the northernmost Kingdom in Remnant.
attributes.description: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang have fought hard alongside their friends to bring the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas, the northernmost Kingdom in Remnant. However, the futuristic urban-sprawl may hide just as much danger as the Grimm-infested tundra that surrounds it. Enemies and allies will collide as our heroes fight to stop Salem's forces, but banding together is dangerous when you don't know who you can trust.

attributes.title: Live from Remnant
attributes.caption: Join Miles, Yssa, and friends for a live RWBY Volume 7 hype spectacular!
attributes.description: Join Miles, Yssa, and friends for a live RWBY Volume 7 hype spectacular!

attributes.title: Volume 7 Intro
attributes.caption: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang have fought hard alongside their friends to bring the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas, the northernmost Kingdom in Remnant.
attributes.description: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang have fought hard alongside their friends to bring the Relic of Knowledge to Atlas, the northernmost Kingdom in Remnant. However, the futuristic urban-sprawl may hide just as much danger as the Grimm-infested tundra that surrounds it. Enemies and allies will collide as our heroes fight to stop Salem's forces, but banding together is dangerous when you don't know who you can trust.

attributes.title: FRWBY Teases Ch.9 & Recaps Vol. 7
attributes.caption: Eric gets us all up to speed on RWBY Volume 7, while sharing a small clip of Chapter 9.
attributes.description: Eric gets us all up to speed on RWBY Volume 7, while sharing a small clip of Chapter 9.

attributes.title: Volume 8 - Official Trailer
attributes.caption: With the lantern in her grasp, Salem’s power is reaching daunting new heights; Atlas, and the entirety of Remnant, have never been in more grave danger. Is there any hope of Team RWBY prevailing, or is Salem’s influence truly too great to be defeated?
attributes.description: With the lantern in her grasp, Salem’s power is reaching daunting new heights; Atlas, and the entirety of Remnant, have never been in more grave danger. Is there any hope of Team RWBY prevailing, or is Salem’s influence truly too great to be defeated?

attributes.title: Volume 8 Intro
attributes.caption:
The Relic? Gone. Atlas? On the brink. And Salem? She’s real. And she’s here.
Ruby, Weiss, Blake, Yang and the rest of our heroes find themselves trapped. On one side, they’re fugitives and former allies are now enemies. On the other, Grimm.
attributes.description:
The Relic? Gone. Atlas? On the brink. And Salem? She’s real. And she’s here.
Ruby, Weiss, Blake, Yang and the rest of our heroes find themselves trapped. On one side, they’re fugitives and former allies are now enemies. On the other, Grimm. Salem and her forces are on Atlas’s doorstep and if Atlas falls, the rest of the world won’t be long after. The battle draws near and it’ll take a united front if there’s any hope of victory, but that’s easier said than done when united is something Remnant has never been.

attributes.title: V8:E1 Watch Party + Q&A
attributes.caption: The Cast and Crew of RWBY Volume 8 takes you through  Episode One: Divide and answers your questions via chat!
attributes.description: The Cast and Crew of RWBY Volume 8 takes you through  Episode One: Divide and answers your questions via chat!

attributes.title: RWBY Volume 8 Midseason Trailer
attributes.caption: The clash between Salem and Ironwood’s forces has begun. With our heroes caught in the middle and impossible choices in every direction, will they figure out how to save the Kingdom of Atlas... or is the war for Remnant already lost?
attributes.description: The clash between Salem and Ironwood’s forces has begun. With our heroes caught in the middle and impossible choices in every direction, will they figure out how to save the Kingdom of Atlas... or is the war for Remnant already lost?

attributes.title: RWBY Recap Episode 1 - Volumes 1 & 2
attributes.caption: This episode of RWBY Recap has all that you need to know about RWBY Volumes 1 & 2.
attributes.description: Four girls, each with their own motivations to become Huntresses, join together to form Team RWBY and combat the monsters plaguing the world of Remnant. This is where their journey begins, and whether you’re just getting into the series or want a quick refresher of the early Volumes, this episode of RWBY Recap has all that you need to know about RWBY Volumes 1 & 2.

attributes.title: Thank You for 100 Episodes of RWBY!
attributes.caption: With the release of RWBY Volume 8 Chapter 8, we’re celebrating the 100th episode of RWBY! Thank you to everyone who has followed, supported, and lifted up our band of heroes and villains throughout the years.
attributes.description: With the release of RWBY Volume 8 Chapter 8, we’re celebrating the 100th episode of RWBY! Thank you to everyone who has followed, supported, and lifted up our band of heroes and villains throughout the years. We can’t wait for you to see what we have in store for them next!
attributes.display_title: Thank You for 100 Episodes of RWBY!

attributes.title: RWBY Recap Episode 2 - Volume 3
attributes.caption: In the wake of Roman Torchwick’s capture following his attack on Vale, unease spreads throughout the kingdom. Team RWBY eagerly looks forward to the Vytal Festival Tournament as other forces move in the shadows building upon what Roman started.
attributes.description: In the wake of Roman Torchwick’s capture following his attack on Vale, unease spreads throughout the kingdom. Team RWBY eagerly looks forward to the Vytal Festival Tournament as other forces move in the shadows building upon what Roman started. New friends and foes await us as Team RWBY heads into Volume 3!

attributes.title: RWBY Recap Episode 3 - Volumes 4 & 5
attributes.caption: New trials await each of them as they find their own ways to keep moving forward in Volumes 4 and 5 of RWBY!
attributes.description: Team RWBY has separated as the Fall of Beacon is felt throughout the world and Salem’s forces continue to move in the shadows. Ruby Rose makes her way to Mistral alongside the remaining members of Team JNPR and the rest of her teammates return to their family homes. New trials await each of them as they find their own ways to keep moving forward in Volumes 4 and 5 of RWBY!

attributes.title: RWBY Recap Episode 4 - Volume 6
attributes.caption: Another of the 4 Huntsman Academies has closed its doors, forcing Team RWBY to look toward Atlas for safety.
attributes.description: Another of the 4 Huntsman Academies has closed its doors, forcing Team RWBY to look toward Atlas for safety. Relic in hand, they set out for the city of Argus hoping to find safe passage to the Kingdom, but with so much they still don’t know, their journey takes an unexpected turn. Lies are undone and the truth is revealed in RWBY Volume 6!

attributes.title: RWBY Recap Episode 5 - Volumes 7 & 8
attributes.caption: Even with some familiar faces to greet them, it is difficult to know who can be trusted as we move into RWBY Volumes 7 & 8!
attributes.description: After a harrowing journey through Mistral, Team RWBY arrives in the Kingdom of Atlas only to find that it may not be the safe place they had hoped for. Even with some familiar faces to greet them, it is difficult to know who can be trusted as we move into RWBY Volumes 7 & 8!

attributes.title: RWBY: Arrowfell Teaser Trailer
attributes.caption: Take a first look at RWBY: Arrowfell, coming in 2022 for consoles and PC from WayForward, Rooster Teeth, and Arc System Works! Play as all four members of Team RWBY in this side-scrolling action-adventure set in the world of RWBY!
attributes.description: Take a first look at RWBY: Arrowfell, coming in 2022 for consoles and PC from WayForward, Rooster Teeth, and Arc System Works! Play as all four members of Team RWBY in this side-scrolling action-adventure set in the world of RWBY! (Note: Footage is pre-alpha and not final.)

attributes.title: RWBY: Volume 9 - Official Teaser
attributes.caption: After the harrowing events of Volume 8, our heroines are thrust into an unknown world – the Ever After! However, once Team RWBY explores this strange and mysterious realm, they quickly discover it might not be quite as unknown as they first assumed. As they journey to find a way back home, they'll have to overcome some of their toughest challenges yet – the struggle of their own identities, and whether or not they're equipped to stop Salem.
attributes.description: After the harrowing events of Volume 8, our heroines are thrust into an unknown world – the Ever After! However, once Team RWBY explores this strange and mysterious realm, they quickly discover it might not be quite as unknown as they first assumed. As they journey to find a way back home, they'll have to overcome some of their toughest challenges yet – the struggle of their own identities, and whether or not they're equipped to stop Salem.

attributes.title: RWBY Volume 9 Chapter 1 Clip
attributes.caption: Ruby makes a new friend in the Ever After.
attributes.description: Ruby makes a new friend in the Ever After.
